title: How to Block Someone on Xbox One

steps.headline: Turn your Xbox One on and let your dashboard load.
steps.description: If you are turning your console on instead of waking it from sleeping, it may take a couple extra seconds to boot up.

steps.headline: Open the Friends tab.
steps.description: Scroll to the right side of your dashboard until the Friends tab at the top of the screen is highlighted. You should have to only go over one page.

steps.headline: View online friends.
steps.description: Press the A button on the button on the left side of the page that says “Friends Online.” Doing this will load up your list of friends on the screen.

steps.headline: Locate a friend.
steps.description: Look on the left side of the screen for your friends options. Scroll down to the bottom of the page where it says “Find Someone” and hit the A button. Type the name of the person you want to find and block into the box. Use the on-screen keyboard and type their username in exactly as it appears.

steps.headline: Select their name from the results by pressing the A button on it.
steps.description: Their profile will load on the screen.

steps.headline: Block the person.
steps.description: Scroll down the list of options on their profile until you have the “Report/Block” button highlighted. Press the A button to open up the Report/Block options. Pick the “Block” option by scrolling down to it and hitting the A button on it. A screen will pop up telling you that the user is now blocked.

steps.headline: Click the Windows logo at the bottom left of the screen.
steps.description: This will open the Start menu.

steps.headline: View all apps.
steps.description: Click “All Apps” to open a list of all the apps on your computer in alphabetical order. Scroll down until you hit the letter “X.”

steps.headline: Load the Xbox app.
steps.description: Select the green box that reads “Xbox” to open the Xbox app. Now you will need to log in.

steps.headline: Log in.
steps.description: Enter your account information in the text boxes provided, and click “Sign in” to continue.

steps.headline: Search for the person to block.
steps.description: Click the box at the top right side of your Xbox app that says “Find People.” Type in their gamertag in the search field. Make sure you specify case sensitive or numbers when you are typing the name.

steps.headline: Pick the user from the list below where you typed the gamertag in.
steps.description: Their profile will load inside the Xbox One app.

steps.headline: Block the person.
steps.description: Look below their name for a series of options. One of the options says “More”; click it to load a drop-down menu, and then select “Block.” You have now blocked that person on your Xbox One.

text: Using the Xbox One Console Turn your Xbox One on and let your dashboard load. If you are turning your console on instead of waking it from sleeping, it may take a couple extra seconds to boot up. Open the Friends tab. Scroll to the right side of your dashboard until the Friends tab at the top of the screen is highlighted. You should have to only go over one page. View online friends. Press the A button on the button on the left side of the page that says “Friends Online.” Doing this will load up your list of friends on the screen. Locate a friend. Look on the left side of the screen for your friends options. Scroll down to the bottom of the page where it says “Find Someone” and hit the A button. Type the name of the person you want to find and block into the box. Use the on-screen keyboard and type their username in exactly as it appears. Select their name from the results by pressing the A button on it. Their profile will load on the screen. Block the person. Scroll down the list of options on their profile until you have the “Report/Block” button highlighted. Press the A button to open up the Report/Block options. Pick the “Block” option by scrolling down to it and hitting the A button on it. A screen will pop up telling you that the user is now blocked. Using a Computer with Windows 10 Click the Windows logo at the bottom left of the screen. This will open the Start menu. View all apps. Click “All Apps” to open a list of all the apps on your computer in alphabetical order. Scroll down until you hit the letter “X.” Load the Xbox app. Select the green box that reads “Xbox” to open the Xbox app. Now you will need to log in. Log in. Enter your account information in the text boxes provided, and click “Sign in” to continue. Search for the person to block. Click the box at the top right side of your Xbox app that says “Find People.” Type in their gamertag in the search field. Make sure you specify case sensitive or numbers when you are typing the name. Pick the user from the list below where you typed the gamertag in. Their profile will load inside the Xbox One app. Block the person. Look below their name for a series of options. One of the options says “More”; click it to load a drop-down menu, and then select “Block.” You have now blocked that person on your Xbox One.
